ProjectDescr.Title: The transcription factor MIST1 regulates apoptosis and TRIB3 expression under hepatic ER stress
ProjectDescr.Description: To investigate MIST1 mRNA expression patterns and loss of function in chronically injured liver tissue, we used a mouse model of chronic liver injury induced by carbon tetrachloride (CCl4). Tissue samples were obtained from the right lateral lobe of wild-type mice at various time points, specifically 1, 3, 6, and 8 weeks after CCl4 treatment. In addition, tissue samples were collected from Mist1 knockout mice after 8 weeks of CCl4 treatment to assess the impact of MIST1 loss of function in the context of chronic liver injury.
